list.name: Nikolas
list.text: A modern digital dental clinic that is pleasant to be in. A friend recommended it, and I have no regrets. I had ceramic veneers installed by Vitalii Raievskyi and I'm thrilled with the work. I always dreamed of an aesthetic smile and I'm glad I finally found my doctor.

list.name: Iryna Stepanova
list.text: Excellent clinic. Service and treatment at the highest level. Convenient location in the center of Kyiv. Highly recommend!

list.name: Dmytro
list.text: Yesterday I finally came to Vitalii for a cleaning. Like a fairy tale). And removing tartar with ultrasound was completely painless, unlike one well-known clinic. And the secret is simple, the doctor explained. Wonderful. I'll probably bring my sister to him.

list.name: Anna
list.text: A gorgeous clinic, service at the highest level, very satisfied with the doctors and their approach. Responsible, punctual. Highly recommend.
